unnormalised: ## Automotive News Flash: New Wheels Hitting Indian Roads!
normalised: ## Automotive News Flash: New Wheels Hitting Indian Roads!

unnormalised: Ola Electric just dropped a bomb! Their new e-scooter, the S3 Air, promises to be a game-changer. Deliveries are starting next week in Bangalore and Chennai. Expect to see them zipping around Indiranagar soon.
normalised: Ola Electric just dropped a bomb! Their new e-scooter, the S three Air, promises to be a game-changer. Deliveries are starting next week in Bangalore and Chennai. Expect to see them zipping around Indiranagar soon.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Mahindra is teasing everyone with glimpses of their upcoming Thar 5-door. Rumours suggest a launch around Diwali. Could this be the ultimate off-roader for your Leh-Ladakh trip?
normalised: Meanwhile, Mahindra is teasing everyone with glimpses of their upcoming Thar five-door. Rumours suggest a launch around Diwali. Could this be the ultimate off-roader for your Leh-Ladakh trip?

unnormalised: In other news, Maruti Suzuki's WagonR facelift is finally here! Dr. Sharma from ICAT praised its improved fuel efficiency. Apparently, it now boasts 25 kmpl.
normalised: In other news, Maruti Suzuki's WagonR facelift is finally here! Doctor Sharma from I C A T praised its improved fuel efficiency. Apparently, it now boasts twenty five kilometer per liter.

unnormalised: And for those with deeper pockets, BMW launched a limited edition M series car, priced at a cool Rs. 1.8 Cr. Talk about Diwali Dhamaka!
normalised: And for those with deeper pockets, B M W launched a limited edition M series car, priced at a cool rupee one point eight crore. Talk about Diwali Dhamaka!

unnormalised: Finally, the Tata Nano's spiritual successor is allegedly in the works. This time, with an electric heart! Could this be the affordable EV India needs? The buzz is building up, and it may have a showroom footprint of around 2000 sq ft. Stay tuned for more updates!
normalised: Finally, the Tata Nano's spiritual successor is allegedly in the works. This time, with an electric heart! Could this be the affordable E V India needs? The buzz is building up, and it may have a showroom footprint of around two thousand square feet. Stay tuned for more updates!
